kit.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a set of tools, equipment etc that you use for a particular purpose or activity
kit.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Sally keeps her make-up kit in her bag.
kit.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: something that you buy in parts and put together yourself
kit.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: electronic equipment, especially computers and computer software
kit.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: The new kit includes wireless keyboard and gaming headset.
kit.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a set of clothes and equipment that you use for a particular purpose such as playing a sport
kit.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: a set of clothes and equipment used by soldiers, sailors etc
kit.translation[0].definitions[4].exampl: The soldiers are trained to jump from the planes with full kit on.
kit.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: a set of equipment, materials etc, used for a particular purpose
kit.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: 1500 publicinformation kits were produced and mailed directly to social service agencies.
